name: Golden Bliss
description: A luxurious blend of sweet vanilla and warm amber, wrapped in woody undertones. This captivating fragrance opens with fresh bergamot and calming lavender, leading to a heart of rich vanilla and delicate jasmine. The base notes of amber and musk create a lasting, sophisticated trail.

name: Rose Elegance
description: An enchanting floral masterpiece centered around the queen of flowers - the rose. Opening with fresh lemon zest and delicate rose petals, it evolves into a heart of jasmine and peony. The base of musk and sandalwood provides a sophisticated, long-lasting finish.

name: Amber Mystique
description: A mysterious and sensual fragrance that combines warm amber with exotic spices. The fresh bergamot and cardamom opening leads to a rich heart of amber and patchouli. The base of cedarwood and vanilla creates an unforgettable, warming trail.
